mapper.insert: insert into goods (goods_source, goods_name, goods_photo, goods_price, brand_id, goods_classify, goods_showTime, goods_description, goods_upTime, goods_location, goods_num, goods_priceSum, goods_property) values (#{goodsSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsClassify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsShowtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsUptime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsPricesum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{goodsProperty,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update goods
goods_source = #{goodsSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_photo = #{goodsPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_price = #{goodsPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goods_classify = #{goodsClassify,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_showTime = #{goodsShowtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_description = #{goodsDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_upTime = #{goodsUptime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_location = #{goodsLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goods_num = #{goodsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
goods_priceSum = #{goodsPricesum,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
goods_property = #{goodsProperty,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update goods set goods_source = #{goodsSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_photo = #{goodsPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_price = #{goodsPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_classify = #{goodsClassify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_showTime = #{goodsShowtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_description = #{goodsDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_upTime = #{goodsUptime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_location = #{goodsLocation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_num = #{goodsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_priceSum = #{goodsPricesum,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, goods_property = #{goodsProperty,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from goods order by rand() limit 9
select goods_name,goods_classify,goods_description,goods_photo,goods_price,goods_property from goods order by rand() limit 4

select g.goods_photo as goods_photo,g.goods_id as goods_id,g.goods_name as goods_name,g.goods_price,g.goods_showTime as goods_showTime,g.goods_description as goods_description,g.goods_upTime as goods_upTime,g.goods_property as goods_property,g.goods_num as goods_num,b.brand_logoName as brand_logoName FROM goods g join brand b on g.brand_id=b.brand_id where b.brand_logoName like concat("%",#{brandLogoname},"%")
